extendedInfo.description: The most classic bubble shooting game, with brand new item balls and deluxe graphics! There are 200+ challenging levels waiting for you to clear up!# In classic mode, you can shoot balls to make combination of 3 the same color to clear balls. # In advanced mode, the game rule is the same, but you can shoot many item balls which have super power - fire ball, bomb ball, wild color ball, iron ball, etc.Enjoy shooting bubbles!kw: shoot, bubble, dexlue, maniac, combination.

reviews.title: THE BEST 1 OUT THERE!
reviews.comment: it is the best one you will find the graffics are great the levels are fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Levels
reviews.comment: The update hasn\'t given me any new levels. I\'ve been stuck on level 320 for months
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This game is ok. It is very beautiful. But i remember on the old app store there was a different bubble shoot game which was my fave because you had the ability to swap the bubble sround for the different coloured one  but this game is fun too
reviews.author: Ben Ding

reviews.title: Update not good
reviews.comment: Stuck on level 320.  Got up to 322.  When i passed it took me back to 320 again.  Playin on galacy s3.  No more fun.  HELP or update again.  Last update NOT GOOD!
reviews.author: Debra Scott

reviews.title: James
reviews.comment: Great game just needs a lot more levels
reviews.author: James Buffum

reviews.title: COME ON PEOPLE!!!!
reviews.comment: An Update is needed for this game. I have completed every level even the advanced stage. I have been stuck on the last level 320 for months, everytime I clear the bubbles it just repeats level 320 again and again !!!! Please send update and i\'ll give u more stars, thanks.
reviews.author: Paul S

reviews.title: Bubble mania
reviews.comment: By law you are required to tel if there are strobe affects on something for people who have seizures, there is no warning that I found and this game has stupid, annoying and useless lights that flicker across the screens.  I had to quit playing the game because of the lights that could trigger a seizure for me.  These lights need to be removed or a warning notice in Place.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sux
reviews.comment: Balls r too random wait too long to get color u need
reviews.author: Chris Barnes

reviews.title: Stuck on Level 321 on Advanced and Classic
reviews.comment: I can\'t unlock the next levels! I thought the levels would unlock once i completed the ones before. I doubt they\'ll update it though =/ I\'d give it a full 5 stars if they would have added more levels. I felt this game was too easy though. I beat every level first try about 90% of the time.
reviews.author: Alex MacDonald

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Been stuck at level 320 since I updated and half the time the screen will go white where you can only see the balls but can\'t see what color you\'re shooting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bubbly fun
reviews.comment: This game is addictive! Would get 5 stars if 1) the music was updated & less annoying. 2) additional levels were added. I can\'t count how many times I\'ve made it to level 321 & gone back to beginning level to start game over. Starting to get bored.  Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Kathy Willinger

reviews.title: Time Passer
reviews.comment: Bubble Maniac is a lot of fun. I don\'t think its a really challenging game, but its fun and passes time!
reviews.author: amanda dreher

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: This is one of the better bubble games on the market (lest we forget the greatest bubble shooter that has since been removed). That said, occasionally bubbles seem to have a mind of their own and fire wherever they feel. I\'ve also found that on occasion they will teleport through a bubble and appear above it. If these were fixed that would be great. Also, an endless mode would be welcome.
reviews.author: John Shieldsmith

reviews.title: Lost and found!
reviews.comment: I had to delete everything from my phone and I thought I could just easily find this one again. Not so easy but I finally found it. BEST BUBBLE GAME OUT THERE! I know because I tried LOTS.
reviews.author: Mary Delorme

reviews.title: any update ?
reviews.comment: thought it was just me, game won\'t play past level 320! I do enjoy this game, but sort of pointless now can\'t achieve more levels, could you please fix or I I\'ll probably uninstall. have rated 3 stars only cost of this. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Fun for plau
reviews.author: Hasrulzee Affendi

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Interface not so great on note 2. Can\'t mute the sound due to overlap. Have enjoyed the game but time to find a new one

reviews.comment: level 180 is too difficult i have stuck up for days the space is too low. Please change\tthe space too low stuck up for days

reviews.comment: Great game works perfectly
